This is a stab in the dark but I experienced once that some tests that
ran =
correctly on windows deadlocked on Solaris. The reason in that
case was tha=
t the threading models were different and those tests
tested some threading=
-stuff that was not correctly implemented and
when run under solaris schedu=
ler it deadlocked.

My wife experienced that their system that was somewhat=
 threading
intensive started behaving weirdly when they got new dual-core
m=
achines.

There used to be a setting on the linux JVM:s (way back) where yo=
u
could set wether to use the operating systems threads or JVM-emulated
one=
s. I could be wrong about the details and it may not be relevant
anymore.

=
Since your tests just stop running without a message it could be a
similar =
issue you're experiencing here? I would look for
thread-related issues.


O=
